name: Brave Jumper
description:
If you appeared in a difficult situation, don't respond To you the team of cheerful rescuers will come!For them there is no nothing impossible! They not only will remove a silly kittens from a tree, but and will rescue people from the burning building, or will from stealing of aliens.

Little Story

As a child, I really liked the "Flying Hero" game on NES, so when I was still inexperienced in developing games myself, I decided that my 2nd game would be a clone of my favorite game.

After 3 months of development, I published it in October 2013. The audience did not take the game very much and often complained about the high complexity, primitive graphics and poor optimization. This did not upset me much and I took into account the mistakes made in this game in my next games.

In 2015, I went to Tokyo, and to my surprise, I saw a man playing this game in the subway. To the question, how is he playing? he said that in his childhood he had a similar game, “Game and Watch fire”.
